en.quest: - Spend some (5 - 17) Forge Points
- Gather some (400 - 400,000) supplies
- Build 2 decorations from your age OR Build 3 decorations from the previous age and Pay some (2,000 - 1,867,200) coins
- Defeat this very small army OR Solve this simple negotiation and Make people enthusiastic
- Motivate or polish 25 buildings of other players and In a production building, finish a 5-minute production some (3 - 17) times
- Recruit 3 Units from your age OR Recruit 4 Units from the previous age and Buy 5 Forge Points
- Collect 3 incidents OR Exchange 2 items in the Antiques Dealer building and Pay some (1,400 - 960,000) supplies
- Donate some (30 - 240) goods to the guild treasury OR Spend some (18 - 63) Forge Points and Gather some (2,000 - 1,700,000) coins
- Infiltrate 3 sectors OR Solve this simple negotiation and Finish a 4-hour production some (1 - 8) times in a production building
- Collect 750 Tavern Silver OR Win some (3 - 6) battles without losing
- Exchange 3 items in the Antiques Dealer building OR Defeat this small army and Pay some (2,400 - 2,240,600) coins
- Win some (2 - 8) battles OR Spend some (12 - 42) Forge Points and Gather some (800 - 750,000) supplies
- Pay some (5 - 35) selected goods from the previous age
- Defeat this medium sized army OR Solve this moderate negotiation and Spend some (12 - 42) Forge Points
- Gather some (24 -240) goods, e.g. from goods production buildings or by trading OR Donate some (40 - 290) goods to the guild treasury and Gain some (30 - 12,000) total population
en.reward: 120 Footballs and Olympic Treasury Upgrade Kit

- Spend 400 Tavern Silver in the Friends Tavern OR Infiltrate 4 sectors and Pay some (2,100 - 1,440,000) supplies
- Defeat this medium sized army OR Solve this moderate negotiation and In a production building, finish a 5-minute production some (3 - 17) times
- Collect 3 incidents OR Contribute some (30 - 105) Forge Points to Great Buildings and Gather some (1,000 - 850,000) coins
- Pay some (5 - 35) selected goods from the previous age and Spend some (16 - 55) Forge Points
- Visit 20 Friends Tavern OR Defeat some (10 - 42) units and Pay some (2,400 - 2,240,600) coins
- Build 2 residential buildings from your age OR Build 3 residential buildings from the previous age
- Finish 15 productions in production buildings from your age OR Finish 18 productions in production buildings from the previous age and Spend some (14 - 50) Forge Points
- Gather some (18 - 180) goods, e.g. from goods production buildings or by trading OR Donate some (30 - 240) goods to the guild treasury and Gather some (800 - 800,000) supplies

- Motivate or polish 25 buildings of other players OR Pay some (5 - 35) selected goods from your age and Build 5 decorations from your age OR Build 6 decorations from the previous age
